originalText.text: I’ve been working with WCS for about a year. My recruiter Kim is the best. She got me into a good paying job. The unit I work on the people are so sweet and supportive. They treat me like one of their own. Also Erica, who works in compliance keeps you updated always to make sure you're good. I’ve even recommended 3 other nurses who have all worked with them and had a positive experience. Love love love working with WCS!!!

text.text: I’ve been working with WCS for about a year. My recruiter Kim is the best. She got me into a good paying job. The unit I work on the people are so sweet and supportive. originalText.text: Highly recommend WCS for all your future jobs !!! I have worked very closely with the senior managing director, Grant Thomas and my recruiter Sam Thompson. They are both extremely knowledgeable, professional and compassionate individuals. They have listened to my wants and needs and turned my goals into reality. They set me up with the best outpatient procedure setting I could ask for. I’m truly enjoying my job and my co workers because of them. They truly have my best interest in mind. They were able to negotiate a high pay rate for me. I referred a friend to WCS who was very unhappy at her previous job. She is currently employed by WCS and has told me it’s the best decision she has ever made. To all the nurses out there, if you are unhappy at your current job please reach out to WCS, you will not regret it.

originalText.text: Working with WCS , here has been great thus far. I have been working with Tim Park and it has been a winner experience. He is very interested in the success of my goals  that I have brought to his attention since day One. He is very ambitious and active in the line of work that he does. Very concerned and commitments to make sure the follow ups with the company and me are addressed in a proper and professional matter. Tim also helps to contribute to improved productivity in the organization. I have already recommended the WCS to a friend and in the near future, I will continue to do so :)

originalText.text: I really enjoyed working with WCS. My recruiter Zoe Carrillo was just amazing as ever. She made sure all questions were answered in a timely fashion and what she was unsure about She got you the answers quickly. She checked in on how you are doing on a weekly basis and made herself available to your needs immediately.  This company is lucky to have her on their team. Thanks for a wonderful experience Ms. Carrillo.

originalText.text: I was referred to this agency by a friend at a time when I was very unhappy at my previous job. Grant Thomas and my recruiter Sam Thompson were extremely helpful from the very start. They listened to my concerns, what I was looking for in a job and really pulled through to find me the best position at the highest possible pay rate. Anytime I have a question or need help with something both Sam and Grant have gone above and beyond to help me. I would recommend WCS to any nurse looking for employment. It is a great company and they really care about you as an individual. I am now so much happier at my job and I am learning and have an opportunity to grow as an RN.
